description: This file defines a repository interface for UtilityAccountEntity, extending JpaRepository to provide CRUD operations and a custom method to find accounts by provider name.

classes.name: UtilityAccountRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data JPA repository interface for UtilityAccountEntity, providing data access methods including custom finder.

methods.name: findByProviderName
methods.description: Custom method to find a UtilityAccountEntity by its provider name, returns an Optional containing the entity if found.

calls: JpaRepository's save, findById, delete methods, etc.
